alert.note: Alert for Coeur d'Alene Area; Idaho Palouse (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 06 at 3:22PM MST until January 07 at 8:00PM MST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 AM TO 7 PM PST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Colfax, Quincy, Winchester, Worley, Cheney, Hayden, Ephrata, Wilbur, Ralston, Moscow, Cashmere, Othello, Coeur d`Alene, Uniontown, Tekoa, Odessa, Moses Lake, Rockford, Rosalia, Coulee City, Spokane, Creston, Grand Coulee, Electric City, La Crosse, Lamona, Post Falls, Wenatchee, Harrington, Davenport, Entiat, Potlatch, Plummer, Genesee, Stratford, Oakesdale, Chelan, Pullman, Ritzville, Coulee Dam. * WHEN...From 7 AM to 7 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Anticipate patchy blowing and drifting snow.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
